title: Call for test of notion - PushByListening

story.text: Let me start the testing using a local-hosted server site (lets use port 9211) since it knows about over 30000 SFW pages and over 300 sites.
First chore: locate where in the script the process which produces Recent Changes resides.
Possible code location: It might be we can do this within the activity.js file in the client subdirectory of the node-module for the activity plugin.
